main_definition: Photos, in this context, refers to photographs or images captured by a camera.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Visual representations of people, places, objects, or events.
meanings_and_examples.example: She took some beautiful photos on her vacation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A collection of photographs, usually displayed in an album or digital format.
meanings_and_examples.example: He compiled his favorite family photos into a photo album.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The act of taking pictures with a camera or other device.
meanings_and_examples.example: I enjoy the process of photos when I go hiking and capture nature's beauty.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used in Spanish-speaking countries to refer to photo prints, especially those found on walls as decorations.
meanings_and_examples.example: The vibrant colors of the beach photos brighten up her living room wall.
